byline.original: By HAROLD DENNY Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

headline.main: NEWS LACKING IN BRITAIN; Somewhat More Hopeful Attitude Taken on Norway

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 1--A somewhat more hopeful attitude on the fighting in Norway was discernible here today in comparison with yesterday's gloom. But, despite the improvement in tone, there is no attempt in official circles to gloss over a serious and dangerous situation or disguise that thus far it is a ...
